segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm planning a trip to Europe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you decided which city you want to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , what's the price of this route ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's $ 400 and we will visit 4 cities .
segments.speaker: S1
